I highly recommend getting this for a vest to fit all dress up occasions. I will be getting more clothes from this brand.

评论概述: beware that shades of green not as expected!!
评论详情: these vests are  Good quality Fabric, fit well, adjustable on back, and the appearance on the groomsmens was exactly as we were hoping.. however, the shade 'Green' on selection showed a much brighter like Kelly Green or Grass Green shade. The shade we received was like a dark olive green. kind of like a grayish green. since it was too close to the wedding to send them back and get a different color We just had to go with it. I'm not sure if the other colors are different upon receiving, but I would suggest ordering in plenty time in case you have to return for a proper shade. or ask seller if they have swatches . other than the color issue everything else was great. I would have given 5/5 stars had it not been for the color discrepancy
